title: accessor
description: A typed accessor into a buffer-view.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer().

bufferView.description: The id (JSON property name) of the buffer-view.

byteOffset.description: The offset relative to the buffer-view in bytes.  Must be a multiple of the size of the data type.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() offset parameter.

byteStride.description: The stride, in bytes, between attributes referenced by this accessor.  When 0, the attributes are tightly packed.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() stride parameter.

componentType.description: Valid values are BYTE (5120), UNSIGNED_BYTE (5121), SHORT (5122), UNSIGNED_SHORT (5123), FLOAT (5126).  Corresponding typed arrays: Int8Array, Uint8Array, Int16Array, Uint16Array, and Float32Array. WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() type parameter.

count.description: The number of attributes referenced by this accessor, not to be confused with the number of bytes or number of components.

type.description: Specifies if the attribute is a scale, vector, or matrix.  WebGL: see vertexAttribPointer() size parameter.

max.description: Maximum value of each component in this attribute.

min.description: Minimum value of each component in this attribute.
